Self

Travelled to Townsville from Canberra on 29 July 2016 to attend the 50th anniversary of Lavarack Barracks. Economy ticket booked from Canberra to Brisbane and Brisbane to Townsville. Economy was booked out for the Brisbane to Townsville leg and was upgraded to Business Class.
Travelled to Townsville on 29 July 2016 to attend the 50th anniversary of Lavarack Barracks. Travelled on VIP plane back to Canberra.

Travelled privately from Canberra to Spain on 9 July 2016, returning on 25 July 2016. Privately paid for return Business Class airfares. Upgraded to First Class from Dubai to Barcelona on outward journey. Upgraded to First Class from Barcelona to Dubai and Dubai to Melbourne on return journey.

disclosures.entity: Mr Cai Wei, Minister, Chinese Embassy
disclosures.details: Echoes of Great Times: The Most Beautiful Works of Arts in Ancient China Hardcover book on 11 August 2016. Valued at $450.
Hotel for Beersheba 2016. Accommodation for the 2nd Beersheba Dialogue in Sydney on 31/10/2016. Costed at $239.

Hotel and Flights for trip to Sydney. Flights and accommodation for the Carlton Lamb Masterclass for Labor Futures Program on 06/10/2016. Hotel was costed at $329, flight from CBR-SYD costed at $221.90 and flight SYD-CBR costed at $225.24.

Delegation to Korea. From 22/10/2016 to 27/10/2016 I travelled to Korea to represent the Leader of the Opposition on an official delegation for the Commemoration of the 60th Anniversary of the Korean War. Business class flights at a cost of: $9753.35. Hotels (Busan Paradise Hotel and LOTTE Hotel Seoul) at a cost of $1641.66. Ground transport at a cost of: $206.48. Other expenses at a cost of $378.00.

Two guest passes to the 15th National Security Summit were provided by the conference organiser, Informa. The 15th National Security Summit was held at the Hyatt Hotel in Canberra on 29 and 30 August 2017. The total value of the two guest passes was $3289 (GST inclusive).
Two tickets to a SINET cyber security conference. The conference was held in Sydney on 26 and 27 September 2017. The tickets were valued at $700 each based on the discounted government rate

disclosures.entity: Taipei Economic and Cultural Office in Australia
disclosures.details: TAI-HWA Pottery vase Gift given from  value: $500 approx.
ASPI Artificial Intelligence and National Security Masterclass Ticket. The Masterclass is to be held on 2 July 2018. The ticket was valued at $500.

ASPI Conference 'Building Australia's Strategy for Space' Ticket (1 day only). The Strategy for Space Conference was held in Canberra on 14 and 15 June 2018. The ticket was valued at a cost of $935.00 based on the discounted government rate.

VIP Flight from Melbourne to Katherine. On 7 June 2018, I was provided with a flight on the VIP aircraft from Melbourne to Katherine to accompany the Leader of the Opposition at community events and meetings.
Ticket for STEM in Defence summit, provided by Informa. On 21 August, I was provided a ticket to attend the STEM in Defence summit at a cost of $995+GST.

Flights on 31 October from Canberra to Melbourne and return on 2 November from Melbourne to Canberra. I travelled to Melbourne for the annual Beersheba Dialogue, hosted by the Australian Strategic Policy Institute. My flights were at the expense of ASPI, at a cost of $237.26.

disclosures.entity: Winnunga and residents of the Alexander McConachie Centre
disclosures.details: Hand painted Aboriginal Artwork. On Wednesday 12 September I was gifted by Winnunga an Aboriginal artwork, hand painted by two residents of the Alexander Mcconachie Centre valued at approximately $500.

Business Class return airfares from Canberra to San Francisco. The Australian Strategic Policy Institute provided business class return airfares to attend the 1.5 Track Australia-US Cyber Security Dialogue on the margins of the RSA Conference at a cost of: $12,192.57
